channel.title: Black ops Freezes?
channel.description: My friends' and I experience freezing while play Black Ops. This happens to us everyday and its pissing us off. No other game I have freezes me. My CD doesn't have any scratches.

item.title: Black ops Freezes?
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

Still no luck. It became very slow and takes years to load a game.

Read full topic

item.title: Black ops Freezes?
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

[quote=“B2300 T4nk, post:22, topic:408760”][quote author=Muroth link=topic=510039.msg3700988#msg3700988 date=1312748682]
EDIT:
Delete game data / update patches, you might have a corrupt update for BO and causes multiplayer to not work correctly.

If not try restoring the PS3 file system.

[/quote]Thanks, hope this works.[/quote]
Any update?

Read full topic

item.title: Black ops Freezes?
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

EDIT:
Delete game data / update patches, you might have a corrupt update for BO and causes multiplayer to not work correctly.

If not try restoring the PS3 file system.

item.title: Black ops Freezes?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“B2300 T4nk, post:13, topic:408760”][quote author=mcbeans link=topic=510039.msg3700913#msg3700913 date=1312746347]

[quote author=B2300 T4nk link=topic=510039.msg3700908#msg3700908 date=1312746206]

it’s either the bandwidth usage or you run your ps3 too long, studies show the best and healthiest gaming hours for you and your game console are 2 hours a day.
[/quote]Like I said only Black Ops freezes.

on multi or just regular forgive me if you’ve already stated this im too lazy to look at your op. but it’s most likely a bandwidth problem if you’re online (of course)
[/quote]I also play online on MW2???[/quote]

Might be trey arcs server?

Read full topic
